attributes.action: prevent missuse of Disabled Parking  to alter the blue card to show a photograph of the disabled driver
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The streets of our towns are becoming blocked by the misuse of the blue card disabled parking, bringing disrepute to legitimate users. It is beleived a photograph somewhere on the blue card would help reduce road congestion and blocked disabled parking bays by disabled card abuse.
